1.title: The Causal Relationship Between Cake and Fun
1.plot: Officer Don can't take it anymore, but he'll have to if he wants to make detective. Zoe's 19th Birthday provides the girls with their newest case. If the client is "in house" does this mean the work is "pro bono"?

2.title: Lingonberry Scam
2.plot: Zoe and Chloe are on the case. The crime - missing presents from Zoe's Nana in Norway. What kind of monster would steal a sweater from Grandma? A lone gunman? Or maybe it's linked to Organized Crime.

3.title: Guantanamo Garage
3.plot: The Missing Gifts all have one thing in common, besides all being from Nana Dragaboo, and coming from Norway, and all being addressed to Zoe...Ok so they all have 4 things in common, but the one thing in common that may crack this case?...THE US MAIL.

4.title: Mail Shmail
4.plot: The Girls bone up on their working knowledge of the US Mail. While Zoe tries to get help from the dreamy Professor Testerlowenstein, Chloe's conversation with her Dad, Police Chief Holmes, sparks an idea on how to take their investigation to the next level.

5.title: Bin-ya-oogle
5.plot: Professor Testerlowenstein provides Zoe with their biggest clue yet. Meanwhile, Chloe and Roberta's tailing skills are called into question. Hopefully they can get help from local street entrepreneur $ully.

6.title: Dividends
6.plot: Street Entrepreneur $ully has what any detective needs, working knowledge of the neighborhood, and refreshing lemonade. Will the Girls investment in small business pay off as they try to track down the stolen goods?

7.title: 3 Girls 1 Troll
7.plot: Chloe and Roberta track Letter Carrier Lance Tuttle to this strange little store. The stakeout begins and keeps going. Meanwhile Zoe's clues have led her to the exact same store. Coincidence? or Conspiracy?

8.title: Not Exactly
8.plot: The Girls use their sweet techno setup to spy on Lance Tuttle who has been in that store way too long. Could mild mannered Letter Carrier Lance Tuttle be more than he seems? Or is this all a set up? Can Zoe's missing gifts really be linked to organized crime?

9.title: SKOAL
9.plot: The Season 2 Finale has the Girls celebrating their closing of another case. Even though payment is moot, it is still a win. But not everyone is happy with the Girls' success. The supply of exquisite Norwegian Homegoods, has dried up and The Boss is none too pleased. Catch a sneak peak at Season 3 following the episode.

1.title: On the Case
1.plot: Private Detectives Zoe Jones and Chloe Holmes, in their daily board meeting, discuss fiscal responsibility and lack of cases.

2.title: Secret Ingredient
2.plot: Private Detectives Zoe Jones and Chloe Holmes have got a case thanks to their new secretary Roberta, hopefully she's a volunteer.

3.title: Just the Usual
3.plot: Private Detectives Zoe Jones and Chloe Holmes seek guidance from their mentor Officer when he's off duty at his apartment - surely he won't mind?

4.title: Winners
4.plot: Private Detectives Zoe Jones and Chloe Holmes, with their new Secretary in tow, work the case.

5.title: Pristine Cookies
5.plot: Private Detectives Zoe Jones and Chloe Holmes, with their new Secretary in tow, work the case. Zoe Gets advice from the dreamy Professor Testerlowenstein, while Chloe and Roberta question shady characters.

6.title: Just Desserts
6.plot: With the Evidence gathered, its time to set the trap. Private Detectives Zoe Jones and Chloe Holmes, with their new Secretary and mentor Officer set up a sting operation to catch a red hot from the oven thief.

locations: North Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA
imdb.title: Zoe & Chloe
synopsis:
Zoe Jones is an Archeology Major, She loves Dinosaurs, Indiana Jones, and cats. Chloe Holmes is in for Criminal Justice, She studies the California Penal code for fun, and dreams of one day wearing a badge like her father. These two hapless college students have nothing in common, except their desire to solve mysteries.  Throw in Roberta their witless, useless secretary and petty criminals better watch their backs.   
SEASON 1: Zoe & Chloes newest case comes to the young sleuths through their new hire, Roberta. Her beautiful sister Delilah is a champion Baker, but her award winning secret ingredient has been stolen.  The girls race to track down the thief, recover the secret ingredient, and hope they finally get paid for their services.
